## LocalPermanentStorageService class

Implementation of permanent storage using LocalStorage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LocalPermanentStorageService implements PermanentStorage 
```
<b>Implements:</b> PermanentStorage

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get(name)](./common-store.localpermanentstorageservice.get.md) |  | Gets value that was stored with 'name' from permanent storage |
